articles.author: Evan Perez, CNN Justice Correspondent
articles.title: Trump's acting attorney general leaves without creating controversial special counsels
articles.description: Acting Attorney General Jeffrey Rosen is resigning Wednesday at noon, ending a tenure marked by the things that didn't happen, including no special counsels appointed despite pressure from the White House.
